title: Get all measures — all_measures
code: all_measures(sample(1:5, 100, T)) #> Calculating Adj, TPs and distances #>   redundancy repetitions adjacency turning_points distances   coupon #> 1 0.01659926   0.1818182 0.3780488      0.4756098  1.621951 10.11111 #>   repetition_gap_med repetition_gap_mean       RNG      RNG2 NSQ cluster_ratio #> 1                  3            4.663158 0.5141353 0.4899697   0      5.583333 #>   phase_length_1 phase_length_2 phase_length_3 phase_length_4 phase_length_5 #> 1      0.5689655      0.2931034       0.137931              0              0 #>   fod_m5     fod_m4    fod_m3    fod_m2    fod_m1     fod_0    fod_p1    fod_p2 #> 1      0 0.02020202 0.1010101 0.1111111 0.1818182 0.1818182 0.1919192 0.1010101 #>       fod_p3     fod_p4 fod_p5 #> 1 0.06060606 0.05050505      0

title: randMeasures: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation. — randMeasures-package
Redundancy — redundancy
text: s Sequence vector. Optional. Vector alternatives (e.g. 1:6 mental dice task).

title: Repetitions — repetitions
text: s Sequence vector. full Optional. Boolean.

title: Repetitions — repetitions
text: full returns vector length = length(s) whether ith item repetition last. Otherwise returns mean repetition rate.

title: Repetitions — repetitions
code: s <- sample(1:10, 100, T) repetitions(s) #> [1] 0.1111111 repetitions(s, full=T) #>   [1]    NA FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE #>  [13] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [25] FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [37] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [49] FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE #>  [61] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [73] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [85] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [97] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
